content.prompt: Which of the following most accurately describes the data in the table?

choices.label: The median time spent in stages 1 and 2 is 214 minutes.
The mode time spent in REM sleep is 111 minutes.
The range of time spent in stages 1 and 2 is 20 minutes.
The mean time spent in stage 3 is 9 minutes.

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
